name: Peck Pocket
description:
Peck Pocket is a university project with the theme of altruism.

Playing as a bird, your objective is to collect as much food for your nest as possible within the given time; enemies, such as customers, workers and pest control, will attempt to hinder your progress.

You will be trying to provide a good living for your family and friends in the nest by stealing food from the humans who have taken over your habitat. The more food you provide the larger your nest will grow and the more frequently you will get requests from other characters. Complete these requests for bonus points; failing them will lose points. If you fail to bring back enough food your nest will shrink and requests will become less frequent.

Feedback Form:
